# replaceAll(_:)

**Instance Method**

Replaces all mesh parts in this collection with those from the new sequence.

## Declaration

```swift
mutating func replaceAll<S>(_ newElements: S) where S : Sequence, S.Element == LowLevelMesh.Part
```

## Parameters

- **newElements**: The elements to replace the contents of the collection.

## Updating collection contents

- **append(_:)**: Adds an element to the end of the collection.
- **append(contentsOf:)**: Adds the elements of a sequence or collection to the end of this collection.
- **removeAll()**: Removes all mesh parts from this collection.
